definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: If you are in a hurry we have a two-hour quick service.
sentences.chinese: 如果您很急，我们有两个小时特急服务。

sentences.english: Grandpa is always impatient when talking on the phone, he hangs up before I finish talking.
sentences.chinese: 打电话总是特急，我还没说完话他就挂机了。

sentences.english: They sent reporters on special rush assignment.
sentences.chinese: 他们派出去记者有特急任务。

sentences.english: For his service in its hour of need.
sentences.chinese: 如果您很急，我们有两个小时特急服务。

definition: to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels/to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)
to become more urgent/more rapid/urgent/to handle a matter urgently
Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. for 住房和城鄉建設部|住房和城乡建设部[Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4]
to approve and forward/to endorse/stamp "approved for distribution"
to reply officially to a subordinate
PRC National Development and Reform Commission
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 Gai3 ge2 Wei3

definition: abbr. for 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会, PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
red-letterhead document, an official document with the name of the issuing government agency printed in red at the top, circulated to relevant bodies
